name: THE CRICKE
features: A beautiful Cricket website. It's totally based on Cricket. A wonderful home page with responsive navbar, banner carousel, realistic footer. Each button has been made attractive so that it is easily visible to everyone.
bodyPart1: The biggest feature of this website is that it is very clean and tidy. This is a news portal. Made only by News Base. I hope readers will enjoy reading the news on such websites. Each section is highlighted with great headlines. So readers can understand what has been discussed here by looking at each section.
bodyPart2: The category pages of The Cricket website have been amazing to look at. Some great buttons have been used. If the reader wants, he can go to the new page by clicking on that button.
bodyPart3: There is another surprise on the landing page. Here, on the one hand, you can find the news deadlines, on the other hand, you can also see the headlines of the best news of the day.
bodyPart4: There is a lot of work in the footer section. Here is the link to the social media. There will also be more useful links.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, No JavaScript, No NodeJS or ExpressJS
tools: VS Code, Font Awesome, Google Font
